fr.ecp.IS1220.group5.project.menu

Class Order

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • fr.ecp.IS1220.group5.project.menu.Order
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Order
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.io.Serializable
    The class which represents a customer's cart It is created by a Customer, who can add Items and Meals.
    Version:
    2.0
    See Also:
    Customer, Item, Meal, Serialized Form

        public Order(Restaurant restaurant,
             Customer customer,
             java.math.BigDecimal delivery_cost_per_km,
             java.math.BigDecimal markup_percentage,
             java.math.BigDecimal service_fee)
        Constructor of the order.
        Parameters:
        restaurant - the restaurant from which the meals and items are taken.
        customer - the customer who is ordering.
        delivery_cost_per_km - the delivery cost per kilometer.
        markup_percentage - the markup percentage of MyFoodora's system.
        service_fee - the service fee of MyFoodora's system.
